Title: Relates to allowing a nursing home patient to install an electronic monitoring device or connected device in such patient's room
Summary: Relates to allowing a nursing home patient to install, operate and maintain, at such patient's own expense, an electronic monitoring device or connected device in such patient's room.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing a nursing home patient to install, operate and maintain an electronic monitoring device or a connected device in such patient's room
